casebody.data:
Stephen H. Olin, as Committee, etc., Respondent v. The Metropolitan Elevated Railway Company, et al., Appellants. Decided May 4, 1891. Appeal from judgment entered upon the decision of a judge at special term. Davies, Short & Townsend, attorneys, and Edward B. Thomas of counsel, for appellants. John Montgomery, for respondent.

Before Sedgwick, Ch. J., Freedman and McAdam, JJ.

Per Curiam.

The judgment must be affirmed, with costs.
